movie_id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for each movie

title.type: VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, -- Title of the movie (cannot be null)

duration.type: INT NOT NULL CHECK (duration BETWEEN 30 AND 240), -- Duration of the movie (must be between 30 and 240 minutes)

year_of_making.type: INT CHECK (year_of_making >= 1888), -- Year the movie was made (must be 1888 or later)

age_limit.type: INT CHECK (age_limit IN (7, 10, 13, 18)) -- Age limit for the movie (can only be one of the predefined values)

theater_id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for each theater

name.type: VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, -- Name of the theater (must be unique and not null)

capacity.type: INT NOT NULL CHECK (capacity > 0) -- Theater capacity (must be a positive number)

seat_id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for each seat

theater_id.type: INT NOT NULL REFERENCES Theaters(theater_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, -- Foreign key to Theaters table (if the theater is deleted, its seats will be deleted too)

row_number.type: INT NOT NULL, -- Row number for the seat

seat_number.type: INT NOT NULL, -- Seat number within the row

is_handicap.type: BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, -- Whether the seat is a handicap-accessible seat (default is FALSE)

UNIQUE.type: (THEATER_ID, row_number, seat_number) -- Ensure that each seat in a specific row and theater is unique

schedule_id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for each schedule entry

theater_id.type: INT NOT NULL REFERENCES Theaters(theater_id), -- Foreign key to Theaters table

movie_id.type: INT NOT NULL REFERENCES Movie(movie_id), -- Foreign key to Movie table

show_date.type: DATE NOT NULL, -- Date of the movie showing

show_time.type: TIME NOT NULL -- Time of the movie showing

ticket_id.type: SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, -- Unique identifier for each ticket

schedule_id.type: INT NOT NULL REFERENCES Schedule(schedule_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, -- Foreign key to Schedule table (if a schedule is deleted, its tickets will be deleted too)

seat_id.type: INT NOT NULL REFERENCES Seats(seat_id), -- Foreign key to Seats table

price.type: NUMERIC(6, 2) NOT NULL CHECK (price > 0), -- Price of the ticket (must be greater than 0)

UNIQUE.type: (SCHEDULE_ID, seat_id) -- Ensure that each ticket is unique for a specific schedule and seat
